comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Rock Cut Cave Temple - Main Hall - Statues of Ramses the Great as Osiris God of the Underworld - Osirid or Osiride statues - Holding the scepter and flail of Pharoh - Statues are 30 ft high. - similar images found at: oi.uchicago.edu/gallery/pa_egypt_bees_abu_simbel/ (photographs from the University of Chicago's Egyptian Expedition, 1905-06)

comment.author: 8099187@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Rupestre, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
